body_html: Thanks for reaching out. A lot of time has passed since 0.8. As you know, the API is not going to become stable until 1.0. I'm not sure what version you're currently using. The release history should document the breaking changes that have occurred since. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases Beyond that, you may want to consider StackOverflow for community-driven support. If you're confident this is a bug in TensorFlow, I will re-open this issue provided more information.

body: Thanks for reaching out. A lot of time has passed since 0.8. As you know, the API is not going to become stable until 1.0. I'm not sure what version you're currently using. The release history should document the breaking changes that have occurred since. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases Beyond that, you may want to consider [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) for community-driven support. If you're confident this is a bug in TensorFlow, I will re-open this issue provided more information.
